inclusion.criterion: All patients should be proven to have UTI by detecting pyuria in urinalysis (WBC>10 per high power field) and had a positive urine culture result.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A KUB film, and renal sonography will be performed to exclude the possibility of urolithiasis or other urinary tract pathology.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Not yet have lower urinary tract surgery in the past.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient has not yet accepted anticholinergic medication
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient or his legally acceptable representative has signed the written informed consent form.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with severe cardiopulmonary disease and such as congestive heart failure, arrhythmia, poorly controlled hypertension, not able to receive regular follow-up.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with uncontrolled confirmed diagnosis of acute urinary tract infection.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients have laboratory abnormalities at screening including: (1) Aspartate aminotransferase (AST) > 3 x upper limit of normal range. (2) Alanine aminotransferase (ALT) > 3 x upper limit of normal range. (3) Patients have abnormal serum creatinine level > 2 x upper limit of normal range.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Female patients who is pregnant, lactating, or with child-bearing potential without contraception.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with any other serious disease or condition considered by the investigator not suitable for entry into the trial.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients participated investigational drug trial within 1 month before entering this study.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of fever, chills, nausea and vomiting. She also complains of dysuria, urgency and frequency. The urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts.
